sentences.sContent: It is right that we should care about and take pride in the way we express ourselves.
sentences.sCn: 我们就应该时时在意自己的表达方式，并且要引以为豪，这也是应有的态度。

sentences.sContent: I take pride in your achievements and avail myself of this opportunity to extend to you my best wishes for your success and happiness.
sentences.sCn: 我为你的成绩感到骄傲，并借此机会向您致以良好的祝愿，祝你今后取得更大的成绩，幸福愉快。
